https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oWdpSLwVWGwLNLLLqIOfSXMqovt.jpg A visual poem in a universe of realities. A woman in an abandoned city in Brazil returns to a world of memory and feeling in a place where trapped souls relive moments from the past. As Cinzas de Deus
